title: Strengthening Business Practical Skills: Lesson Study for Enhancing Preservice Mathematics Teachers’ Self-Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can improve their self-efficacy in classroom instruction design and management by over 20% through 8-week CoP+LS activities.
Participants can develop at least three realistic problem-solving strategies through case analyses reflecting actual classroom situations.
Participants can complete a professional development portfolio through peer assessment and self-reflection.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
